hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql:
insert into "products" ("body_html", "created_at", "handle", "id", "image", "images", "options", "product_type", "published_at", "published_scope", "tags", "template_suffix", "title", "metafields_global_title_tag", "metafields_global_description_tag", "updated_at", "variants", "vendor") values ('
  • Samsung SDH-B74081 8-Channel Full HD Video Security System
  • General Features: 
  • 8 Channel DVR with 1080p Full HD Recording
  • Eight (8) 1080p Full HD Weather Resistant Outdoor Cameras included
  • Built-in 2 Terabyte SATA hard drive
  • Backwards Compatible with Existing Non-HD Analog Cameras
  • Free iPhone and Android Wise View App
  • Supports Mac OS and Windows
  • Automatic Email Notification of Events
  • Privacy Mask Feature
  • Network & HDMI Cables Included 
  • Display:
  • Video: Inputs: 8CH BNC
    • Resolution: 1080P/720P/960H
  • Live: Frame Rate: NTSC: Max 240fps @1920 x 1080 / 240fps @1280 x 720 / 240fps @960 x 480
    • PAL: 200fps @1920 x 1080 / 200fps @1280 x 720 / 200fps @960 x 480
  • Resolution: 1080P/720P/960H
  • Multi Screen Display: single/ Quad/Eight/S.E.Q.
  • Performance:
  • Operating System: Embedded Linux
    • Installation wizard: support
    • Compression H.264
  • Recording: Record Rate: Up to 120fps @1920 x 1080 / Up to 240fps @1280 x 720 / Up to 240fps @960 x 480
    • Mode: Manual, Schedule (Continuous / Event), Event (Pre / Post), Time Lapse (1~30fps)
    • Overwrite Modes: Off/On(Auto/1/3/7/14/30/90days)
    • Event: Video Loss, Motion(Sensitivity Level 1~8)
    • Pre-Alarm: Min. 1S
    • Post-Alarm: Up to 5min (30 sec, 1, 2, 5min)
  • Search & Playback: Search Mode: Date/time, Event, Motion
  • Playback Function: Fast forward / backward (2x, 4x, 8x, 16x)
    • Slow forward(1/2x, 1/4x, 1/8x,1/16x)
    • Step Forward (applicable for local DVR only)
  • Network: Transmission Speed: Max. 1080P 120fps 
    • Bandwidth: Up to 32Mbps
    • Bandwidth Control: Fixed
    • Live Stream: Max. 1080P 120fps
    • Max. Remote users 20 (Max. bandwidth 32M) 
    • Protocol Support: TCP/IP, UDP/IP, RTP(UDP), RTP(TCP), RTSP, NTP, HTTP, DHCP,  PPPoE, SMTP,
    • DNS, DDNS, uPnP
    • Monitoring: Webviewer, Mobile Viewer
  • Smartphone: Web/App viewer: Supported OS: PC: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Mac OS X 10.9 and above 
    • Mobile: Android Ver 3.0 or above, iOS 7.0 or above
    • Supported Browser: Microsoft Internet Explorer (Ver. 11,10,9,8), Mozilla Firefox 43.0.4, Google Chrome V42, Safari 5.1 and above
    • Protocol Support: TCP/IP, UDP/IP, UDP, P2P
    • Transmission Speed: CIF Max. 25fps (Single channel)
    • Max. Remote users: 20 (Max. bandwidth 32M)
  • Storage: File Format (Back up): H.264, AVI, MP4 
    • USB (backup): 2 USB ports 
  • Security: Password Protection: 1 Admin and 6 Users
  • Interface: 
  • Eight (8) BNC video connectors 
  • One (1) VGA (1024x768,1280x1024,1280x720,1440x900,1920x1080)
  • One (1) HDMI (1024x768,1280x1024,1280x720,1440x900,1920x1080
  • One (4) RJ-45 10/100Mbps Base-T Ethernet LAN port 
  • Four (4) RCA Audio inputs 
  • One (1) RCA Audio output 
  • Two (2) USB 2.0 ports (one front, one back) 
  • Power Specifications: 
  • DC 12V
  • DVR Dimensions: 
  • 2.05 x 11.81 x 8.66-inches (H x W x D , approximate)
  • Camera Features:
  • 1080p Full HD resolution
  • Wide angle field of view (105º)
  • True Day & Night with ICR
  • IP66 weather resistant
  • 30 LEDs
  • Night vision up to 82ft (25m)
  • Ingress Protection IP66
  • DC 12V input voltage
  • Video:
  • Imaging Device / Effective Pixels 2M CMOS (1/2.7) / 1920(H) x 1080(V)
  • Scanning System: Progressive, 30fps (NTSC) / 25 fps (PAL)
  • Synchronization / Min. Illumination: Internal /0Lux (IR LED on)
  • Camera Output: 1CH BNC, Max. Transmission Length: 180ft (3EA attached 60ft camera cable combined) 
  • Min. Cable Length: 60ft (18.3m) included
  • Horizontal Resolution: 1080p
  • Lens:
  • Focal Length / Max. Aperture Ratio: 3.6mm / F2.1
  • Angular Field of View: D:105°/H:88°/V:46
  • Operational:
  • Shutter Mode / Gain Control: Auto (Rolling shutter) / Auto
  • White Balance / Digital Noise Reduction: Auto (1,800° ~ 10500°K) / 3D DNR
  • Contrast Enhancement: Auto
  • Flickerlerless / Day & Night: Auto / TruDay / Night with ICR
  • IR Distance: 82ft (Total Darkness) / 130ft (Ambient Lighting) 
  • Camera Dimensions: 
  • 2.68 x 2.5 x 5.87-inches (H x W x D, approximate) 
  • Samsung SDH-B74081 8-Channel Full HD Video Security System
  • 2 Terabyte hard drive pre-installed
  • Eight (8) 1080p Full HD Weather Resistant Outdoor Cameras
  • Eight (8) 60-foot BNC camera cables with male to female power supply connectors
  • 1 to 8-way power splitter
  • DVR Power adapter (Input: 100-240V, 50/60Hz, 0.6A max., Output: 12V, 2000mA)
  • Camera Power adapter (Input: 100-240V, 50/60Hz, 1.5A, Output: 12V, 3000mA)
  • RJ-45 Ethernet cable
  • HDMI cable
  • USB mouse
  • Remote control w/2 AAA batteries
  • Software CD
  • Quick Guide
  • Screws, Anchors and Hey Key

Condition : This item is Class A refurbished. This is the cleanest class of refurbished product you can buy. This item will be free of defects. It has been repaired and tested by the manufacturer and the problem parts were replaced.
